(Time: 90mins)

Hi Samir,

Confirming we have updated the shipping to the live site.
https://www.designtiles.com.au/checkout/?kinsta-cache-cleared=true

We have turned off the Australia post shipping for now. Also I suggest not updating some of the plugins that may cause the issue. Advanced Product Sample for WooCommerce, Woocommerce

Hi Joel,

Could I please get an update on this? It has been almost a week, and we are not receiving the expected number of orders. Additionally, we have numerous customer inquiries regarding sample orders. Could you prioritize this matter and help us resolve the issue?

Thank you.

Kind Regards,

Samir Bhatta IT Support | Bachelors of IT |

Proudly Supporting
______________________

E:support@designtiles.com.auu
P: (02) 9567 8971
A: 407 Princes Hwy, Rockdale, NSW 2216

IMPORTANT: The contents of the email and any attachments are confidential.They are intended for the named recipients(s) only. If you have received this email by mistake, please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to anyone or make copies thereof.

Hi Samir,

We are working on this in staging, We tried restoring a backup from Oct27 and its shipping price incorrectly. It seems that AU post is giving us a different shipping price. We are creating a custom shipping specifically for sample products.

Hi Joel, I wanted to follow up on this. Do you have any updates? I'm still noticing issues with some of our products( img attached) despite the update. If plugin ( Aus Post ) is causing the trouble, feel free to remove it. We'd like to maintain the following shipping rates for sample products across all states:
  • 1 item: $10.95
  • 2 items: $14.95
  • 3-5 items: $18.95
